subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Josh Johnson pitched a three-hitter, had a career-high 12 strikeouts and drove in three runs to help the Florida Marlins beat the visiting San Diego Padres, 10-1.
snippet: Josh Johnson pitched a three-hitter, had a career-high 12 strikeouts and drove in three runs to help the Florida Marlins beat the visiting San Diego Padres, 10-1.
